stable.changelog:
- Use text wrap in settings to prevent title text cut
- Fixed freeze loaf albums when opening app
- Drop raw format support to prevent some issues

beta.changelog:
- Fixed ClassNotFoundException errors (Video player, WiFi Transfer)
- Updated to SDK 34 to fix the old application alert and block installation (Android 14)
- Removed Theme.Holo components and replaced them with Theme.Material in the UI smali
- Fixed Play Protect warning due to the SDK update
- Dropped support for Android 5 and 5.1
- Synchronized components with AGP 8.1.2
- Updated some links
- Small improvements

developer.changelog:
- Set min sdk 23
- Refresh blur background overlay to work in android preference
- Some bug fixes and cleanings

alternative.changelog:
- Use text wrap in settings to prevent title text cut
- Fixed freeze loaf albums when opening app
- Drop raw format support to prevent some issues
